ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | oppcbas.1 | |- O = ( oppCat ` C ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Homf ` C ) = ( Homf ` C ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` C ) = ( Base ` C ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_homffn | |- ( Homf ` C ) Fn ( ( Base ` C ) X. ( Base ` C ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fnrel | |- ( ( Homf ` C ) Fn ( ( Base ` C ) X. ( Base ` C ) ) -> Rel ( Homf ` C ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_ax-mp | |- Rel ( Homf ` C ) |
| 7 |  | #P_relxp | |- Rel ( ( Base ` C ) X. ( Base ` C ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fndm | |- ( ( Homf ` C ) Fn ( ( Base ` C ) X. ( Base ` C ) ) -> dom ( Homf ` C ) = ( ( Base ` C ) X. ( Base ` C ) ) ) |
| 9 | 4, 8 | #P_ax-mp | |- dom ( Homf ` C ) = ( ( Base ` C ) X. ( Base ` C ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_releqi | |- ( Rel dom ( Homf ` C ) <-> Rel ( ( Base ` C ) X. ( Base ` C ) ) ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_mpbir | |- Rel dom ( Homf ` C ) |
| 12 |  | #P_tpostpos2 | |- ( ( Rel ( Homf ` C ) /\ Rel dom ( Homf ` C ) ) -> tpos tpos ( Homf ` C ) = ( Homf ` C ) ) |
| 13 | 6, 11, 12 | #P_mp2an | |- tpos tpos ( Homf ` C ) = ( Homf ` C ) |
| 14 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( oppCat ` O ) = ( oppCat ` O ) |
| 15 | 1, 2 | #P_oppchomf | |- tpos ( Homf ` C ) = ( Homf ` O ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_oppchomf | |- tpos tpos ( Homf ` C ) = ( Homf ` ( oppCat ` O ) ) |
| 17 | 13, 16 | #P_eqtr3i | |- ( Homf ` C ) = ( Homf ` ( oppCat ` O ) ) |
